name: Teams Notifier Agent (Mock)
description: Mocks sending a Microsoft Teams notification by logging the target and message.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Send Teams Notification (Mock)
skills.description: Logs the intended Teams target (webhook/chat ID) and message.

target.description: The target Teams webhook URL or chat ID.

message_text.description: The text content of the message to send.

success.description: Indicates if the mock notification was logged successfully (always true for mock).
